name: Users are auto-completed in message input box by username
objective: Users are auto-completed as expected, by username, nickname, firstname, lastname (e.g. I can search for `isherwood` and `lindy.isherwood` will be returned)

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
